fullDescription.intro:
Tess4J Node integrates the Tesseract OCR library into KNIME.
You can change the language an Tesseract datapath in the node configuration.

tab.name: Options
tab.option: If you want to use your own .traineddata tesseract language files, select "Use External" and select the folder which contains those language files.

Tesseract uses languages to help with the optical character recognition. Default is "eng" (English), but there are other languages bundled with this plugin.
If you defined your own tessdata path and want to use your own .traineddata file, you will find your language here with the file ending cut off.

ports.inPort: Text as Images. To get better results, normalize and convert the image to black and white. This can be done with a global thresholder, for example.
